subject: Officiating (Sports)
Football
lead_paragraph: Bill Polian, the N.F.L. executive who drafted Peyton Manning and now works for ESPN, said he was surprised that Manning and his teammates seemed to be in sync so soon.
snippet: Bill Polian, the N.F.L. executive who drafted Peyton Manning and now works for ESPN, said he was surprised that Manning and his teammates seemed to be in sync so soon.
